オプション1:
Two months later, the raft was nearing completion.
They'd fitted it with a sail, so with a tailwind
it could gain thrust.

There are ways to make a boat advance even in a headwind,
but the three didn't know them.

Since they didn't even know such methods existed,
it never occurred to them to research them.
Since that day, Nes and Gain hadn't appeared.
